channel.title: Ry's Client V1 (317)
channel.description:
I made this client to help 317 players play on a basic, simple, and working 317 client. It is 100% editable and contains some small entertainment perks such as music. If you dowloaded this thank you and as I will not care if you edit and repost, I just ask that you please mention my name. This is a Ryan's Client source because I know Ryan in real life, and he helped me make this. My name is also Ryan so try not to get us mixed up. [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/RyanR0x/RyBG.jpg[/img] Client includes-
All skillcapes [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/RyanR0x/evolved0012.png[/img]
Working moving firecape/Special attack bar [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/RyanR0x/evolved0011-1.png[/img]
Client also includes- Music Themes Newer models Item ID list NPC ID List Screenshots And much more. [size=18pt]Download![/size] UppIt- http://uppit.com/v/u6iapeww

@system wrote:

I’m not going to lie.
This is quite sexy.

item.title: Ry's Client V1 (317)
item.dc:creator: @RyScape RyScape
item.description:
@RyScape wrote:

[quote=“JlStepper, post:2, topic:329376”]Looks good but you messed up on the lower right hand. The part where it says “Ry’s Client”
It’s not a big deal, but other than that everything else looks good. Keep up the good work mate.[/quote]
Yea I know i was editing it and made it white writing without the square, and the writing was all screwed up so I had to write over it with the square because I didn’t have any other images of it.

Read full topic

I made this client to help 317 players play on a basic, simple, and working 317 client. It is
